dict.string: Sets your Adium and Skype status simultaneously to Online, Offline, Away, DND or lunch.

on alfred_script(q)
--available status if q = "online" then tell application "Adium" to go available tell application "Skype" send command "SET USERSTATUS ONLINE" script name "Alfred" end tell end if
--offline status if q = "offline" then tell application "Adium" to go offline tell application "Skype" send command "SET USERSTATUS OFFLINE" script name "Alfred" end tell end if
--away status if q = "away" then tell application "Adium" to go away tell application "Skype" send command "SET USERSTATUS AWAY" script name "Alfred" end tell end if
--special away (lunch) status if q = "lunch" then tell application "Adium" go away set status message of every account to "üç¥" end tell tell application "Skype" send command "SET USERSTATUS AWAY" script name "Alfred" end tell end if
--special away (do not disturb) status if q = "dnd" then tell application "Adium" go away set status message of every account to "Bitte nicht st√∂ren. üôàüôâüôä" end tell tell application "Skype" send command "SET USERSTATUS DND" script name "Alfred" end tell end if
--special away (meeting) status if q = "meeting" then tell application "Adium" go away set status message of every account to "Meeting üëî" end tell tell application "Skype" send command "SET USERSTATUS DND" script name "Alfred" end tell end if
--special away (deploy) status if q = "deploy" then tell application "Adium" go away set status message of every account to "Deploy" end tell tell application "Skype" send command "SET USERSTATUS DND" script name "Alfred" end tell end if
end alfred_script
